request_body.message: what is mitsolab? and what is the pricing?

response_json.reply:
Mitsolab is a customer-support / personal AI agent service that creates and runs AI agents for individuals and businesses.

Pricing and key features

- Free
  - Price: $0
  - 50 messages/month, 1 AI agent, 1 member, 400 KB per agent, Top LLM models

- Hobby
  - Price: $29/month (or $290/year)
  - Everything in Free, 2,500 messages/month, 1 AI agent, 2 members, full integrations, API access, 4 behavior policies, 10 AI Actions/agent, Basic analytics, 25 MB per agent

- Growth
  - Price: $119/month (or $1,190/year)
  - Everything in Hobby, 10,000 messages/month, 2 AI agents, 3 members, 10 behavior policies, 10 AI Actions/agent, CRM, Ticketing, 50 MB per agent

- Pro
  - Price: $299/month (or $2,990/year)
  - Everything in Growth, 40,000 messages/month, 5 members, 15 AI Actions/agent, Advanced analytics, Ticketing, 80 MB per agent

If you want, I can recommend a plan based on your team size and usage.
